price: Dan tidak seorang pun akan beriman kecuali dengan izin Allah, dan Allah menimpakan azab kepada orang yang tidak berakal.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تُؤۡمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَيَجۡعَلُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna linafsin an tu'mina illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi wayajʿalu al-rij'sa ʿalā alladhīna lā yaʿqilūna
